text: No offense but he kinda crashed the Anna Faris - Chris Pratt Halloween reunion of our dreams. If you're still grieving the Chris Pratt and Anna Faris split, it's time to move on — Anna Faris has! The Overboard star, 41, stepped out with her new man on Halloween. The two have been linked since 2017, so who is Michael Barrett? Also in attendance on the couple's Halloween date? Chris Pratt himself! But before you get too excited about the possibility of a reconciliation and / or love triangle, Pratt, 39, brought a plus one of his own — girlfriend Katherine Schwarzenegger, 28.
